metadata.title: CVE-2024-38542 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/mana_ib: boundary check before installing cq callbacksAdd a boundary check inside mana_ib_install_cq_cb to prevent indexoverflow.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
